title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Login Management
summary: Implement a secure authentication system leveraging multi-factor verification for safe access.
description: Develop a secure authentication framework using multi-factor verification such as passwords, OTP, and biometrics. Ensure data encryption during authentication transactions, establish secure session handling, device recognition, and automatic session expiration. The system should comply with industry-standard security protocols, ensuring that users can access their banking data safely while maintaining a smooth login experience across all supported platforms.

title: Responsive Interface and Personalized Dashboard
summary: Design a user-friendly, responsive interface with a customizable dashboard experience.
description: Develop a responsive, visually appealing user interface optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Create a personalized dashboard where customers can view account details, eligible products, and relevant banking services based on their profiles and financial data. Ensure intuitive navigation, accessibility compliance, and consistency across all device types while enhancing engagement through dynamic and personalized content rendering.

title: Core Banking Integration and Dedicated Performance Database
summary: Enable two-way synchronization between the self-service portal and the core banking system with an independent performance database.
description: Integrate the self-service portal with the bankâ€™s core banking systems via secure APIs or middleware, enabling real-time and batched transaction synchronization. Establish a high-performance database dedicated to portal operations to store local sessions, cached customer data, and application transactions. Include recovery, failover, and monitoring mechanisms to ensure reliability, scalability, and consistent data integrity under peak demand.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Implement self-service digital workflows for account opening and banking service modifications.
description: Design structured, guided processes that allow customers to easily open accounts or modify existing services online. Include input validation, dynamic form completion, automated eligibility checks, and built-in progress tracking. Enable users to save incomplete applications to resume later without losing progress. Utilize streamlined backend workflows to route requests for validation and approval efficiently while minimizing manual interventions.

title: Document Upload and Management System
summary: Enable secure and efficient document upload capabilities for customer verification and request completion.
description: Develop a functionality allowing users to upload ID and supporting documents directly within the portal. Incorporate features such as file type validation, encryption of stored files, and virus scans for security. Associate uploaded documents with specific requests or workflows, provide users real-time status visibility (received, under review, approved), and include capabilities to update or replace files before final submission.

title: Request Tracking and Notification Services
summary: Deliver live status tracking of applications and automated notifications for event updates.
description: Develop a tracking system that provides customers with immediate updates on account openings, modifications, and document submissions. Integrate with email and SMS notification channels to alert users on status changes, approvals, and rejections. Maintain an in-portal notification center showing the most recent updates. Ensure messages are time-stamped, easily searchable, and allow configuration of communication preferences for customers.

title: Interaction History and Audit Records Management
summary: Maintain an accessible interaction history for customers along with compliant audit logs.
description: Implement a comprehensive activity tracking module that logs all actions a customer performs in the portal. Display this interaction history in a user-friendly format accessible to the customer while also storing immutable log records for compliance. Ensure data retention policies, time-stamped entries, and tamper-proof audit capabilities for all critical actions such as authentication, document uploads, and service modifications.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Implementation
summary: Integrate granular role-based access controls for different types of users and authorization levels.
description: Design a flexible RBAC framework defining access hierarchies based on customer type and authorization level. Secure sensitive services by assigning explicit permissions and visibility controls. Integrate this system with authentication modules and allow administrative flexibility to customize or update roles as business needs evolve. Ensure all access changes and permissions assignments are logged for transparency and compliance purposes.

title: Security, Privacy, and Compliance Framework
summary: Implement robust security controls and ensure adherence to data protection and banking compliance standards.
description: Establish end-to-end encryption for all transactions and implement intrusion detection with automatic flagging of suspicious activities. Enforce compliance with data protection frameworks such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and ISO 27001. Include automated vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, and threat monitoring. Integrate comprehensive incident response and reporting workflows to protect sensitive financial and personal information at all times.
